Text:
function EP01_03()

    -- .起-2「私立百合愛学園」
    SaveData.Title = "私立百合愛学園"

PLAY_BGM("BGM03.wav",0)

    -- //BG：ハンバーガー屋
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG001aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask003" , 1000,false)


    MSG([[ A hamburger shop bustling with customers in uniforms who, like me, seemed to have just finished their entrance exams. ]])

    MSG([[ Rico and I sat facing each other at a window seat, snacking on fries and nuggets while exchanging information about each other. ]])

    MSG([[ The stories Rico told me about Yuriai Private Academy were all fascinating―― ]])

    -- //BU：素顔リラ（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIK01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0023.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Rico】
 "At Yuriai's senior high, they give the title of ‘Princess’ to the four cutest students on campus and let the students govern themselves." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0037.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "P-Princess...? Why is that?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIK01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0024.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Rico】
 "Beauty standards change year after year, right? So the purpose is to have the students choose the ideal female image they should aim for." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIK01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0025.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Rico】
 "Well, it’s like a supercharged student council<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> Yuriai places more value on teaching femininity than academics, so to put it dramatically, it’s an ‘absolute cuteness supremacy’ system." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIK01ia")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0026.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Rico】
 "So, someone like me with a plain appearance struggles with poor treatment even in middle school～" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0027.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Rico】
 "Though you’re way cuter than me even though you’re a guy, so you’re probably fine." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0038.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Eh. I think Rico is very cute. Your smile is lovely, and your personality is bright and kind too." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIK01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0028.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Rico】
 "" ]])

    -- //SE：柔らかいものが落ちる音
    PLAY_SE("SEb031.wav")
    WAIT(500)

    MSG([[ A fry slipped off Rico’s finger onto the tray. She quickly picked it up, popped it into her mouth, and smiled. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIK01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0029.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Rico】
 "Alright, alright. Thanks for the compliment～<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> But no matter how good-looking you are, being in the boys’ division usually means you get treated badly. Hang in there, kid." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0039.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I-Is it really that bad...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIK01ia")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0030B.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Rico】
 "It’s at a level that would make ‘The Crab Cannery Ship’ blush." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIK01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0031.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Rico】
 "Apparently, there are only three boys now. According to the seniors, they’re greatly despised by the girls like poison snakes, and all are currently suspended for sexual harassment charges." ]])

    MSG([[ Could I really be attending such a terrifying department...? I suddenly felt incredibly uneasy. ]])

    MSG([[ Yuriai Private Academy was far more unique and had many quirks than I had imagined. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0032_0033.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Rico】
 "It may be a little late after the exams, but there might actually be no advantage in joining the boys’ division? From what I hear, with your academic skills, you could get into any high school." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0040.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Thank you. But there’s someone important to me at Yuriai." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIK01ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0034.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Rico】
 "Eh, d-Does that mean... a girlfriend?" ]])

    MSG([[ For some reason, Rico looked worried and asked me cautiously. ]])

    MSG([[ Realizing my words might cause misunderstanding, I relaxed my expression and answered. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0041.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "It’s my older sister. Since our parents both work, she always took care of me." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0042.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "She’s much stronger and more reliable than any adult, and kinder than our mother... When I was bullied over my face, she was always there to protect me." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //CI：思い出の写真 004
LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI004a")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask009",1000,false)
    -- //左端が破けており、エルメスルートに繋げる、エルメスルートに繋げる

    MSG([[ She always played with me when I felt lonely. She protected me when I was bullied for having a feminine face. She taught me more important things than my teachers ever did. ]])

    MSG([[ My sister has always been and still is the greatest hero in my life. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask010",1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0043.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "So, I want to enter Yuriai Private Academy, like my sister, to be by her side and support her this time. For that, I’ll do whatever it takes." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIK01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0035.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Rico】
 "…………" ]])

    MSG([[ At that moment, I noticed Rico had her mouth open, staring at me, and snapped back to reality. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0044.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "S-Sorry! When it comes to my sister, I tend to lose myself... That must have been creepy." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIK01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0036.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Rico】
 "No, I don’t think that at all. I know well how big admiration can be a strong driving force." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0037.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Rico】
 "If you’re a siscon and you take it that far, that’s actually a powerful weapon, right?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIK01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0038.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Rico】
 "You got that strong just from loving your sister? That’s amazing. You should have more confidence in yourself." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIK01ha")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0039.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Rico】
 "...And if your rival is your own family, maybe I still have a chance." ]])

    MSG([[ Rico muttered something quietly and happily stuffed fries into her mouth. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIK01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0040.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Rico】
 "By the way, what’s the name of your beloved sister? If she’s that amazing, I might even know her." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0045.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Marika Ikusa. Her hair color is the same as mine, and her charm point used to be her long hair that reached down to her waist." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIK01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0041.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Rico】
 "Huh? I-Ikusa Marika...? Isn’t your last name <r=くさみ> Ikusami </r>?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0046.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I-I'm sorry... I was just nervous earlier and stumbled, but it is Ikusa." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0042.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Rico】
 "You’re Marika Ikusa’s little brother... Seriously...?" ]])

    MSG([[ Rico seemed completely stunned, with a fry halfway to her mouth, frozen in thought. ]])

    MSG([[ For her reaction to be that surprised, my sister must be famous at Yuriai Private Academy. Or maybe there was some other reason. ]])

    MSG([[ I couldn’t help but worry what Rico would say next. ]])

    -- //SE：着信音
    PLAY_SE("SEb011.wav",0,true)
--    WAIT(1000)

    MSG([[ Just then, the ringtone of my phone in my pocket went off. ]])

    MSG([[ It was my mom. It’s really rare for her to call during the week since she’s extremely busy with work. I wondered what it could be about. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0047.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Rico, I’m sorry. I need to take this call." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)


    STOP_SE("SEb011.wav")
STOP_BGM()

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0048.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Hello, this is Minato. Mom? Did something happen?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ The next moment—the world stood still. What my mother told me over the phone was too shocking to comprehend. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0049.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Eh...? My sister is unconscious and in the hospital...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ My mother went on saying many things, but none of it stuck in my mind. Only the name of the hospital where my sister was admitted was something I managed to catch. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIK01ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0043.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Rico】
 "M-Minato? Did something happen to your sister? Are you okay?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0050.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Sorry! It seems I’ve gotten caught up in some trouble! I have to go now!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0044.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Rico】
 "Ah――" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //BG：駅前
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG002aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ Without properly saying goodbye to Rico, I rushed out of the burger shop. ]])

    MSG([[ I hailed a taxi at the station, told the driver the name of the hospital where my sister was admitted, and had them hurry there. ]])

    MSG([[ My mind was blank, cold sweat pouring like a waterfall from my forehead, and my hands and feet trembled uncontrollably. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0051.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "That invincible sister of mine can’t possibly die… right? She’ll be alright, won’t she?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ On the way to the hospital, I tightly gripped the pendant hanging from my neck as if trying to break it. ]])

    MSG([[ I recalled my sister’s radiant smile from the days when she used to protect me… ]])

    -- 　　　◆
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("EP01_04")

end
